World Cities.template: SELECT city_name, country, pop_ghs, area FROM geodata.global_glx_open_citiesoftheworld ORDER BY city_name LIMIT 100;

Global Airports.template: SELECT full_name, short_name, main_city, country, iata, icao, rank_group, rank FROM geodata.global_glx_geodata_transport_airport ORDER BY main_city LIMIT 100;

Retail Points.template: SELECT id, store_name, town FROM geodata.uk_glx_open_retail_points ORDER BY town LIMIT 100;

World Cities.meta: Urban agglomerations with a population greater than 100,000.
